body.ab: <lb n="c57-0074__main__1"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0074.06" unit="tei:head"/>Chap. 10<shi rend="underline">th</shi><lb n="c57-0074__main__2"/> Day after day, week after week passed away on <lb n="c57-0074__main__3"/> my return to Geneva and I had not the <lb n="c57-0074__main__4"/> courage to commence my work. I feared the <lb n="c57-0074__main__5"/> vengeance of the disappointed fiend yet <lb n="c57-0074__main__6"/> I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14709"/>could not<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14709"/>I was unable to overcome my repugnance <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>to the task. <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c57-0074.01"> 1</metamark><lb n="c57-0074__main__7"/> My health <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14740"/>also<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14740"/> which had hitherto declined <lb n="c57-0074__main__8"/> was now much restored, & my spirits when <lb n="c57-0074__main__9"/> unchecked by the memory of my unhappy <lb n="c57-0074__main__10"/> promise, rose propor<mdel>it</mdel>tionably. My father <lb n="c57-0074__main__11"/> saw this with pleasure and he turned his <lb n="c57-0074__main__12"/> thoughts towards the best me<mdel/>thod of <lb n="c57-0074__main__13"/> eradicating the remains of my melancholyâ€“ <lb n="c57-0074__main__14"/> which every now and then would return <lb n="c57-0074__main__15"/> by fits & with a devouring blackness over<lb n="c57-0074__main__16"/>cast the approaching <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14789"/>day<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14789"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sunshine. At these <lb n="c57-0074__main__17"/> moments I took refuge in the most <lb n="c57-0074__main__18"/> perfect solitude: <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14807"/>& my deli<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14807"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14810"/>I used to<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14810"/><milestone spanTo="#c57-0074.02" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0074.03"/>Alone <lb n="c57-0074__main__19"/> in a little boat<milestone spanTo="#c57-0074.04" unit="tei:seg" xml:id="c57-0074.05"/>I passed whole days on <lb n="c57-0074__main__20"/> the lake watching the clouds &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>listening to the ripp<del rend="overwritten" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14840"/>les<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14840"/>ling<lb n="c57-0074__main__21"/> of the waves, silent & listless. But the fresh <lb n="c57-0074__main__22"/> air and bright sun seldom failed to<lb n="c57-0074__main__23"/> restore me to some degree of compo<lb n="c57-0074__main__24"/>sure&<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14864"/>I<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14864"/> on my return I met the <lb n="c57-0074__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14869"/>smi<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14869"/> salutations of my friends with a <lb n="c57-0074__main__26"/> readier smile, &<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>a more cheerful heart<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0074__main__27"/> It was after my return from one <lb n="c57-0074__main__28"/> of these rambles that my father calling <lb n="c57-0074__main__29"/> me aside thus a<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>ddressed me.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0074__main__30"/> I am happy to remark, my dear <lb n="c57-0074__main__31"/> son, that <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14917"/>lately<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14917"/> you have <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14920"/>acqu<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14920"/><lb n="c57-0074__main__32"/> resumed your former pleasures & seem <lb n="c57-0074__main__33"/> to be returning to yourself. And yet <lb n="c57-0074__main__34"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14930"/>so<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14930"/> you are still unhappy & still avoid <lb n="c57-0074__main__35"/> our society. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0074__main__d3e14938"/>When I consider<del eID="c57-0074__main__d3e14938"/> For some time<lb n="c57-0075__main__1"/><metamark function="sequence">1</metamark><lb n="c57-0075__main__2"/><metamark function="displacement">my repugnance)X</metamark> I found also that I was unable to compose <lb n="c57-0075__main__3"/> a female without <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e14967"/>fresh<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e14967"/> again devoting <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>several months <lb n="c57-0075__main__4"/> to study & laborious disquisition. I had heard <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e14984"/>also<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e14984"/><lb n="c57-0075__main__5"/> of some discoveries having been made by <lb n="c57-0075__main__6"/> an <mdel>e</mdel>English philosopher the knowledge of which <lb n="c57-0075__main__7"/> was material to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e15003"/>w<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e15003"/> my <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e15008"/>work.<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e15008"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>success<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>and I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e15034"/>thought<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e15034"/>of writing <lb n="c57-0075__main__8"/> sometimes <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>thought of obtainting my fathers consent <lb n="c57-0075__main__9"/>to visit England for this purpose but <lb n="c57-0075__main__10"/>I clung to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0075__main__d3e15066"/>this<del eID="c57-0075__main__d3e15066"/>every pretence of delay & could <lb n="c57-0075__main__11"/>not resolve to interrupt my return <lb n="c57-0075__main__12"/>ing tranquillity<lb n="c57-0081__main__1"/> But it is this gloom which appears to have taken <lb n="c57-0081__main__2"/> too strong a hold of your mind that I wish to dissi<lb n="c57-0081__main__3"/>pate. Tell me therefore whether you object to an imme<lb n="c57-0081__main__4"/>diate solemnization of the marriage. We have been unfor<lb n="c57-0081__main__5"/><del rend="smear" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15113"/>tunate<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15113"/><lb n="c57-0081__main__6"/>tunate, and recent events have drawn us from that <lb n="c57-0081__main__7"/> every day tranquillity <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15123"/>so necess<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15123"/> befitting my years and <lb n="c57-0081__main__8"/> infirmities. You are younger yet I do not suppose, possess<lb n="c57-0081__main__9"/>ed as you are of a competent fortune that an early <lb n="c57-0081__main__10"/> marriage would at all interfere with any future plans <lb n="c57-0081__main__11"/> of honour and utility<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>that you may have formed. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15154"/>Yet<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15154"/> Do not suppose however that <lb n="c57-0081__main__12"/> I wish to dictate happiness to you or that a <lb n="c57-0081__main__13"/> delay on your part would cause me any <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>seriousuneasi<lb n="c57-0081__main__14"/>ness; Interp<mdel>er</mdel>eet my words with candour and answer <lb n="c57-0081__main__15"/> me I conjure you with confidence and sincerity.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0081__main__16"/> I listened to my father in silence and remained <lb n="c57-0081__main__17"/><metamark function="insert">^</metamark>for sometime without offering any reply. I revolved <lb n="c57-0081__main__18"/> rapidly in my mind a multitude of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15215"/>ideas<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15215"/>thoughts and <lb n="c57-0081__main__19"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15224"/>d<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15224"/> endeavoured to come to some conclusion. Alas! <lb n="c57-0081__main__20"/> to me the idea of an immediate union with my <lb n="c57-0081__main__21"/> cousin was one of horror and dismay. I was bound by <lb n="c57-0081__main__22"/> a solemn promise which I had not yet fufilled and <lb n="c57-0081__main__23"/> dared not break; or if I did what manifold mise<lb n="c57-0081__main__24"/>ries might not impend over me and my devo<lb n="c57-0081__main__25"/>ted family! <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15249"/>And<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15249"/> could I enter into a festival with <lb n="c57-0081__main__26"/> this deadly weight yet hanging round my neck and <lb n="c57-0081__main__27"/> bowing me to the ground. No, <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15267"/>that<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15267"/> I could not endure <lb n="c57-0081__main__28"/> that<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0081__main__d3e15278"/>and therefore resolved to<del eID="c57-0081__main__d3e15278"/>I must perform my engage <lb n="c57-0081__main__29"/> ment and let the monster depart with his mate<lb n="c57-0082__main__1"/> before I allowed myself to enjoy the delight of a <lb n="c57-0082__main__2"/> union, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15303"/>I should otherwise eagerly expect<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15303"/>from which I expected. I remembered<lb n="c57-0082__main__3"/> also the necessity I was under of either <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15318"/>going<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15318"/>journeying to England <lb n="c57-0082__main__4"/> or entering into a long correspondence with th<del rend="overwritten" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15329"/>ose<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15329"/>e<lb n="c57-0082__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15340"/>men<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15340"/>philosophers of that country whose knowledge and discove<lb n="c57-0082__main__6"/>ries<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15356"/>might<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15356"/>were of be of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15365"/>inestimable<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15365"/>indispensable<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15380"/>necess<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15380"/> to me<metamark function="insert">^</metamark> in my present undertaking. The latter <lb n="c57-0082__main__7"/> method of obtaining the desired intelligence was dilato<lb n="c57-0082__main__8"/>ry and unsatisfactory; besides any change of scene <lb n="c57-0082__main__9"/> was agreable to me and I was delighted with the <lb n="c57-0082__main__10"/> idea of spending a year or two <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15415"/>away from<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15415"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15418"/>in absence from<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15418"/>myfami<lb n="c57-0082__main__11"/>lyin change of scene& variety of occupation in absence from my family during which time <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15441"/>during this<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15441"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15444"/>time<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15444"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15447"/>which<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15447"/><lb n="c57-0082__main__12"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15453"/>time<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15453"/> some event might happen which would <lb n="c57-0082__main__13"/> restore me to them in peace and happiness. My <lb n="c57-0082__main__14"/> promise might be fulfilled, and the monster <lb n="c57-0082__main__15"/> have departed or some <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15462"/>other<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15462"/> accident might <lb n="c57-0082__main__16"/> occur to destroy him and put an<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15471"/>f<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15471"/> end to my <lb n="c57-0082__main__17"/> slavery for everâ€”These feelings dictated my an<lb n="c57-0082__main__18"/>swer to my father. I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15485"/>said I<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15485"/>expressed <mdel>my</mdel> a wish<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15495"/>ed<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15495"/> to visit England <lb n="c57-0082__main__19"/> but concealing <mdel>my</mdel>the true reasons <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15511"/>for<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15511"/><mdel>my</mdel>of this request I <lb n="c57-0082__main__20"/> clothed my desires under the guise of <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15524"/>wh<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15524"/>wishing to <lb n="c57-0082__main__21"/> travel and see the world before I sat down <lb n="c57-0082__main__22"/> for life within the walls of my native town.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0082__main__23"/> I urged my <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15537"/>request<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15537"/>entreaty with earnestness and <lb n="c57-0082__main__24"/> my father was easily induced to <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15549"/>grant it<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15549"/>comply; for a <lb n="c57-0082__main__25"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15558"/>man<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15558"/> more indulgent <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0082__main__d3e15563"/>and<del eID="c57-0082__main__d3e15563"/>or a less dictatorial parent<lb n="c57-0084__main__1"/> did not exist upon earth. Our plan <lb n="c57-0084__main__2"/> was soon arranged. I should travel <lb n="c57-0084__main__3"/> to Strasburgh where Clerval would <lb n="c57-0084__main__4"/> join me and we should proceed down <lb n="c57-0084__main__5"/> the Rhine together. Some short time <lb n="c57-0084__main__6"/> would be spent in the towns of Holland <lb n="c57-0084__main__7"/> but our principal stay would be in England. <lb n="c57-0084__main__8"/> We should return by France â€“&<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0084__main__d3e15605"/>and<del eID="c57-0084__main__d3e15605"/> it <lb n="c57-0084__main__9"/> was agreed that this tour should occu<lb n="c57-0084__main__10"/>py the space of two years.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0084__main__11"/> My father pleased himself <lb n="c57-0084__main__12"/> with the reflection that I should <lb n="c57-0084__main__13"/> be united to Elizabeth immediately <lb n="c57-0084__main__14"/> on my return to Geneva. These two <lb n="c57-0084__main__15"/> years, said he, will pass swiftly and <lb n="c57-0084__main__16"/> it will be the last delay that <lb n="c57-0084__main__17"/> will oppose itself to your happi<lb n="c57-0084__main__18"/>ness. And indeed I earnestly desire <lb n="c57-0084__main__19"/> that period to arrive when we <lb n="c57-0084__main__20"/> shall all be united and neither hopes <lb n="c57-0084__main__21"/> or fears arise to disturb our domes<lb n="c57-0084__main__22"/>tic<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0084__main__d3e15657"/>felicity<del eID="c57-0084__main__d3e15657"/><del rend="unmarked" sID="c57-0084__main__d3e15663"/>.<del eID="c57-0084__main__d3e15663"/> calm.<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0084__main__23"/> I am content, I replied with <lb n="c57-0084__main__24"/> your arrangement. By that time <lb n="c57-0084__main__25"/> we shall <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>both have <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0084__main__d3e15687"/>both<del eID="c57-0084__main__d3e15687"/> become wiser <lb n="c57-0084__main__26"/> and I hope happier than we <metamark>^</metamark>at present are <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0084__main__d3e15705"/>now<del eID="c57-0084__main__d3e15705"/><lb n="c57-0085__main__1"/> I sighed but my father kindly forbore <lb n="c57-0085__main__2"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15721"/>to me que<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15721"/> question me further concerning the <lb n="c57-0085__main__3"/> cause of my dejectionâ€“ He hoped that <lb n="c57-0085__main__4"/> new scenes and the amusement of tra<lb n="c57-0085__main__5"/>velling would restore my tranquillity<milestone unit="tei:p"/><lb n="c57-0085__main__6"/> I now <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15745"/>arranged<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15745"/>made arrangements for my journey <lb n="c57-0085__main__7"/> but one feeling haunted me which <lb n="c57-0085__main__8"/> filled <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15756"/>w<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15756"/> me with fear and agitation. <lb n="c57-0085__main__9"/> During my absence I should leave my <lb n="c57-0085__main__10"/> friends unconscious of the existence <lb n="c57-0085__main__11"/> of their enemy, and unprotected from <lb n="c57-0085__main__12"/> his attacks, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15768"/>and<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15768"/> exasperated as he <lb n="c57-0085__main__13"/> might be by my departure. But he <lb n="c57-0085__main__14"/> had promised to follow me wherever <lb n="c57-0085__main__15"/> I might go and would he not accom<lb n="c57-0085__main__16"/>pany me to England? This <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15786"/>idea<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15786"/>imagination was <lb n="c57-0085__main__17"/> dreadful in itself but soothing in <lb n="c57-0085__main__18"/> as much as <metamark function="insert">^</metamark>it supposed the safety of my friends would be <lb n="c57-0085__main__19"/> in safety. <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15816"/>Yet<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15816"/> I was agonized with<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15819"/>e<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15819"/><lb n="c57-0085__main__20"/> the idea of a possibility that the reverse <lb n="c57-0085__main__21"/> of this might happen. Bu<mdel>r</mdel>t<del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15838"/>ing<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15838"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0085__main__d3e15842"/>du<del eID="c57-0085__main__d3e15842"/><lb n="c57-0085__main__22"/> through the whole period during <lb n="c57-0085__main__23"/> which I was the slave of my crea<lb n="c57-0085__main__24"/>ture I allowed myself to be govern<lb n="c57-0086__main__1"/> by the impulses of the moment and my <lb n="c57-0086__main__2"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0086__main__d3e15868"/>sensa<del eID="c57-0086__main__d3e15868"/> present sensations strongly <lb n="c57-0086__main__3"/> intimated that the fiend would follow <lb n="c57-0086__main__4"/> me and <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0086__main__d3e15878"/>free<del eID="c57-0086__main__d3e15878"/>exempt my <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0086__main__d3e15887"/>friends<del eID="c57-0086__main__d3e15887"/>family from the <lb n="c57-0086__main__5"/><del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0086__main__d3e15896"/>possibility of<del eID="c57-0086__main__d3e15896"/> danger of his machinations. Thinking thus <lb n="c57-0086__main__6"/> I prepared for my journey with <lb n="c57-0086__main__7"/> alarcrity.<lb n="c57-0087__main__1"/> dreary imaginations I passed th<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>rough many<lb n="c57-0087__main__2"/> beautiful & majestic scenes but my eyes <lb n="c57-0087__main__3"/> were fixed & unobserving; I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e15941"/>co<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e15941"/> could only <lb n="c57-0087__main__4"/> thin<mdel>g</mdel>k of the bourne of my travels & the <lb n="c57-0087__main__5"/> work which was to occupy me whilst <lb n="c57-0087__main__6"/> they endured. After some days spen<mdel>d</mdel>t in <lb n="c57-0087__main__7"/> listless indolence during which I <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e15971"/>travere<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e15971"/><lb n="c57-0087__main__8"/> traversed many leagues I arrived at <lb n="c57-0087__main__9"/> Strasburgh where I waited two days <lb n="c57-0087__main__10"/> for Clerval. He came; <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e15980"/>&<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e15980"/> alas, how great <lb n="c57-0087__main__11"/> was the contrast between us. He was <lb n="c57-0087__main__12"/> alive to every new scene; joyful when <lb n="c57-0087__main__13"/> he saw the beauties of <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e15992"/>sun<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e15992"/>the setting<metamark function="insert">^</metamark>sun and <lb n="c57-0087__main__14"/> more happy when he saw it rise &<lb n="c57-0087__main__15"/> recommence a new day. He pointed <lb n="c57-0087__main__16"/> out to me the shifting colours <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e16021"/>l<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e16021"/> of the <lb n="c57-0087__main__17"/> landscape & the appearances of the <lb n="c57-0087__main__18"/> sky. This is what it is to live, he cried, <lb n="c57-0087__main__19"/> now I enjoy existence. But you, my <lb n="c57-0087__main__20"/> dear Frankenstein, <del rend="strikethrough" sID="c57-0087__main__d3e16056"/>are<del eID="c57-0087__main__d3e16056"/>wherefore are you desponding &<lb n="c57-0087__main__21"/> sorrowful?"
